mean_en: to cause (a person or group of people) to lose hope, enthusiasm, or courage :to discourage (someone)
sentence: He was disheartened when, after a year of searching, he still couldn't find a job.
sentence_trans: 他很灰心：花了一年找工作却还是找不到。
word_etyma: dis分开 ＋ heart心 ＋ en动词后缀 → 心散了 → dishearten使灰心，使沮丧
